title: Free Win In Promos?
body: Lost my Promos for Gold II last night. Came on today, won a game to get back into Promos and didn't get the 1 win in series. I thought it gives a free 1-0 start when you get back into promos that you lost?

replies.body: Did you lose one of your matches because you dodged? If you dodge in your series you will lose your Promo Helper win.

This is correct, dodges will instantly count as a loss in your series, as mentioned in the [Ranked Play FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h6q5)

I did see you pushed through the loss and won your promotion anyway, so congrats OP! :)

Haha yeah I did. Thank you for the response. Some1 wanted to go mid soraka with exhaust cleanse (most likely upset and intending to intentional feed) so definitely worth the dodge lol!

I feel like I'm repeating myself, sorry, but you (or others Reds, not sure) keep down-playing this...

A dodge counts for MORE than a loss. As DTN said, it makes you lose completely your free win from Promo Helper. A simple loss wouldn't do that.

Given that a dodge in Promo Series was already more punishing even before Promo Helper (it was a full loss instead of just a -3 LP outside of series, and for good reasons, I don't contest that), maybe the **triple** punishment now that Promo Helper is out is a bit much...
